MWC.GUI.Shapes

Class RangeRingShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • MWC.GUI.Shapes.PlainShape
      • MWC.GUI.Shapes.RangeRingShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Editable, ClassWithProperty, DraggableItem

    public class RangeRingShape
extends PlainShape
implements Editable
    Class representing a cart-wheel type shape - drawn with inner and outer radiuses, with spokes at 60 degree intervals
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
